Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Array with unix timestamp, wind direction, speed and gust. Change using msg.payload.

Array of colors for series, names or #rrggbb. Change using msg.colors.

Array of stroke widths for series, default is 2. Change using msg.widths.

Unit to label wind speed. Change using msg.unit.
